Good Comments: Fast, efficient, acurate. Couldn't ask for better.

Whoever claimed they were comparable to Formula must have been kidding themselves. It's quite a shoddy work as a whole. It's the faster group of the only two that are currently working on the project, so that's good for those interested in speed though.
Bad Comments: Fast in releasing, clear video quality and good translation. What more can I ask for? :)
Better than Chibi Fansubs and with a great quality, just as Formula!! We love you!!!!!!!
they don't translate songs in the episode, or character transformations, or certain words like "shugoi".
